4.header: Dash Back and Hold Block for 1.5 Seconds
desc: The Hood gains Invisibility for 8 seconds. While Invisible, incoming attacks have a 45% chance to Miss. Non-Contact attacks have double this chance.
While Invisible, the Hood gains 564.1 increased Critical Damage Rating and his attacks ignore 75% Armor and Block Proficiency.
88% Chance to Stagger the opponent, preventing them from gaining their next Buff for 7.50 seconds. When the Stagger expires, 172.2 points of the opponent's Health is siphoned to the Hood.
Refreshes any Shock, Hex, Stagger or Bleed the Hood has placed on the opponent.
Schocks the opponent, dealing 1722 Energy Damage over 7.50 seconds. When the Shock expires, the opponent is Stunned for 0.75 seconds. This effect cannot interrupt Special Attacks.
Hexes the opponent, reducing Ability Accuracy by 85 and FateSealing them for 6.50 seconds. Whent he HEx expires, it deals a burst of 734.72 Energy Damage.
This attack deals 75% increased damage for each full bar of power the opponent has at time of impact.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 1722 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
